TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PEReader extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class PEReader Implements IDisposable
public ref class PEReader sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 提供可移植可执行格式 (PE) 文件的读取器。

span.span: Provides a reader for Portable Executable format (PE) files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现是线程安全的。The implementation is thread-safe. 也就是说，多个线程可以并行从读取器读取数据。That is, multiple threads can read data from the reader in parallel. 读取器的处理不是线程安全的（请参阅 ）。Disposal of the reader is not thread-safe (see ).

span.span: An immutable array of bytes representing the PE image.

summary.span: 通过存储在字节数组中的 PE 映像创建可移植可执行文件读取器。

span.span: Creates a Portable Executable reader over a PE image stored in a byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造 期间，不会读取图像的内容。The content of the image is not read during the construction of the

summary.span: 通过存储在流中的 PE 映像创建可移植可执行文件读取器。

span.span: Creates a Portable Executable reader over a PE image stored in a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成功验证构造函数参数后，流的所有权会传输到 。Ownership of the stream is transferred to the upon successful validation of constructor arguments. 它将被 释放，并且调用方不能对其进行操作。It will be disposed by the and the caller must not manipulate it.

summary.span: 通过存储在内存中的 PE 映像创建可移植可执行文件读取器。

span.span: Creates a Portable Executable reader over a PE image stored in memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内存由调用方拥有，不会释放 。The memory is owned by the caller and not released on disposal of the . 调用方负责使内存保持活动状态，并在 的整个生存期内不进行修改。The caller is responsible for keeping the memory alive and unmodified throughout the lifetime of the . 构造 期间，不会读取图像的内容。The content of the image is not read during the construction of the

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream peStream, valuetype System.Reflection.PortableExecutable.PEStreamOptions options) cil managed
Public Sub New (peStream As Stream, options As PEStreamOptions)

param.name: peStream
param.span: PE 映像流。

span.span: A PE image stream.

param.name: options
param.span: 用于指定如何从流中读取 PE 映像各部分的选项。

span.span: Options specifying how sections of the PE image are read from the stream.

summary.span: 通过存储在流中的 PE 映像创建可移植可执行文件读取器，从其当前位置开始，并在流的末尾结束。

span.span: Creates a Portable Executable reader over a PE image stored in a stream beginning at its current position and ending at the end of the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非指定 ，否则，将在成功参数验证时将流的所有权转移到 。Unless is specified, ownership of the stream is transferred to the upon successful argument validation. 它将被 释放，并且调用方不能对其进行操作。It will be disposed by the and the caller must not manipulate it. 除非指定 或 ，否则在构造 期间，不会从流中读取任何数据。Unless or is specified, no data is read from the stream during the construction of the . 此外，在 处于活动状态并未释放时，调用方不能操作流。Furthermore, the stream must not be manipulated by caller while the is alive and undisposed. 如果 `options` 包括 或 ，则 将读取在构造过程中请求的所有数据。If `options` includes or , the will have read all of the data requested during construction. 同样，如果同时指定了 ，则调用方将保留流的完全所有权，并确保 构造后不会对其进行操作。As such, if is also specified, the caller retains full ownership of the stream and is assured that it will not be manipulated by the after construction.

span.span: is .
has an invalid value.

exception.span: 从流中读取时出错（仅在预提取数据时发生）。

span.span: Error reading from the stream (only when prefetching data).

exception.span: 已指定，并且映像的 PE 标头无效。

span.span: is specified, and the PE headers of the image are invalid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非指定 ，否则，将在成功参数验证时将流的所有权转移到 。Unless is specified, ownership of the stream is transferred to the upon successful argument validation. 它将被 释放，并且调用方不能对其进行操作。It will be disposed by the , and the caller must not manipulate it. 除非指定 或 ，否则在构造 期间，不会从流中读取任何数据。Unless or is specified, no data is read from the stream during the construction of the . 此外，在 处于活动状态且未释放时，调用方不能操作流。Furthermore, the stream must not be manipulated by the caller while the is alive and undisposed. 如果 `options` 包括 或 值，则 将读取在构造过程中请求的所有数据。If `options` includes the or values, the will have read all of the data requested during construction. 同样，如果同时指定了 ，则调用方将保留流的完全所有权，并确保 构造后不会对其进行操作。As such, if is also specified, the caller retains full ownership of the stream and is assured that it will not be manipulated by the after construction.

summary.span: 释放由读取器分配的所有内存。

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 可以多次调用 ，但不能并行调用。 can be called multiple times, but not in parallel. > 与 上的任何其他操作并行调用 或从读取器中检索 时，不安全地调用。It is not safe to call in parallel with any other operation on the or when reading from s retrieved from the reader.

summary.span: 打开与此 PE 映像关联的可移植 PDB。

span.span: Opens a Portable PDB associated with this PE image.

returns.span: 如果 PE 映像具有与之关联的 PDB 并且已成功打开 PDB，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the PE image has a PDB associated with it and the PDB has been successfully opened; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法基于 PE 映像调试目录的内容实现一个简单的 PDB 文件查找。This method implements a simple PDB file lookup based on the content of the PE image Debug Directory. 更复杂的工具可能需要跟进搜索路径或符号服务器上的额外查找。A more sophisticated tool might need to follow up with additional lookup on search paths or a symbol server. 方法按以下顺序查找 PDB：The method looks the PDB up in the following order: 1) 检查包含 PE 文件的目录（`peImagePath`的目录）中的 CodeView 项中找到的名称的匹配 PDB 文件。Checks for a matching PDB file of the name found in the CodeView entry in the directory containing the PE file (the directory of `peImagePath`). 2) 检查 PE 映像本身中嵌入的 PDB。Checks for a PDB embedded in the PE image itself. 返回与调试目录中指定的信息匹配的第一个 PDB。The first PDB that matches the information specified in the Debug Directory is returned.

span.span: or is .

exception.span: 从 返回的流不支持读取和查找操作。

span.span: The stream returned from doesn't support read and seek operations.

exception.span: 由于出现错误，找不到匹配的 PDB 文件：PE 映像或 PDB 无效。

span.span: No matching PDB file was found due to an error: The PE image or the PDB is invalid.

exception.span: 由于出现错误，找不到匹配的 PDB 文件：读取 PE 映像或 PDB 时发生 IO 错误。

span.span: No matching PDB file was found due to an error: An IO error occurred while reading the PE image or the PDB.
